property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After another hero is declared as a defender, exhaust Dori to add his Ú to the defending hero’s Ú for this attack.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a location. Limit 1 per location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After attached location is explored, the first player adds 1 resource to each of his heroes’ resource pools.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Search your deck for a side quest and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Dwarf. Warrior.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Discard 2 cards from the top of your deck to give Longbeard Sentry sentinel and +1 Ú until the end of the phase. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Type
property.value: Side Quest

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Limit 1 per deck. Battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: When this stage is defeated, each player may choose and discard a non-unique enemy engaged with him.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a Ê or Noldor hero. Restricted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After attached hero commits to the quest, discard a card from your hand to place 2 progress on the active location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose a Noldor or Silvan character. Until the end of the phase, add that character’s Ò to its Û.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Cannot have restricted attachments. Enters play exhausted.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Wellinghall Preserver readies, heal 1 damage from an Ent character.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Limit 3 copies of None Return in the victory display.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a non-unique enemy is destroyed, add None Return to the victory display to add that enemy to the victory display.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Action: Lower the cost of the next event that has a Valour trigger you play this phase by 2.
Valour Action: Search the top 10 cards of your deck for an event that has a Valour trigger and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Across the Ettenmoors

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Set aside each of the 3 Across the Ettenmoors side quests and each of the 4 locations with the safe keyword. Reveal 1 of those side quests at random and 1 of those safe locations at random, adding them to the staging area with the safe location guarded by the side quest. Search the encounter deck for 1 copy of Savage Trollspawn per player and add them to the staging area. Shuffle the remaining side quests and safe locations back into the encounter deck. The first player gains control of Amarthiúl.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Across the Ettenmoors

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, if there are no encounter side quests in play, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a side quest is discarded, and add it to the staging area.
Forced: When a side quest is defeated, place progress tokens on Into the Ettenmoors equal to that side quest's quest points.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Across the Ettenmoors

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a side quest is discarded. Reveal that side quest and add it to the staging area, if able.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Across the Ettenmoors

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal 1 additional encounter card during the quest phase unless there is an active location with the safe keyword.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Across the Ettenmoors

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a side quest is discarded. Reveal that side quest and add it to the staging area, if able.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Across the Ettenmoors

property.name: Text
property.value:
Each damaged character gets –2 Ò unless there is an active location with the safe keyword.
If the players defeat this stage, they have escaped the Ettenmoors with their lives, and win the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Across the Ettenmoors

property.name: Traits
property.value: Dúnedain. Ranger. Warrior.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Response: After an enemy engages a player, give control of Amarthiúl to that player.
If Amarthiúl leaves play, the players lose the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Across the Ettenmoors

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ettenmoors. Cave.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Guarded. Safe. Immune to player card effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you travel to Secluded Cave, each player draws 3 cards.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Across the Ettenmoors

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ettenmoors. River.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Guarded. Safe. Immune to player card effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you travel to The Hoarwell, heal 1 damage from each character in play.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Across the Ettenmoors

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Guarded. Safe. Immune to player card effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you travel to Abandoned Camp, each player may return 1 card from his discard pile to his hand.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Across the Ettenmoors

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ettenmoors. Forest.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Guarded. Safe. Immune to player card effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you travel to Patch of Woods, each player adds 1 resource to each of his heroes’ resource pools.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Across the Ettenmoors

property.name: Text
property.value: Savage Trollspawn gets +1 Û for each damaged character the engaged player controls.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each damaged character the defending player controls.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Across the Ettenmoors

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Coldfell Giant engages you, deal 1 damage to 3 different characters you control.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If the defending character has at least 1 damage token on it, attacking enemy makes an additional attack after this one.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Across the Ettenmoors

property.name: Text
property.value: For each excess point of combat damage dealt by Cruel Mountain-troll (damage that is dealt beyond the remaining hit points of the character damaged by its attack) you must remove 1 progress from each quest card in play.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Across the Ettenmoors

property.name: Text
property.value: Ruthless Hill-troll gets +2 Û and +2 Ú while it has 3 or more damage on it.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Shuffle 1 location with the safe keyword (but not its attached encounter) back into the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Across the Ettenmoors

property.name: Traits
property.value: Goblin. Orc.

property.name: Text
property.value: Damaged characters cannot be declared as attackers or defenders against Golbin Pursuer.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+3 Û instead if this attack is undefended).

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Across the Ettenmoors

property.name: Text
property.value:
While Troll-fells is the active location, Weather cards gain doomed 1.
When Revealed: If Troll-fells is not revealed guarding a safe location, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a location with the safe keyword and attach it to Troll-fells, guarded. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Across the Ettenmoors

property.name: Text
property.value:
While Barren Moorland is in the staging area, it gains: “Forced: When an ally enters play, you must either exhaust it or deal 1 damage to it.”
Travel: Deal 1 damage to each exhausted character.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Across the Ettenmoors

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Starting with the first player, each player must either engage an enemy in the staging area with a higher engagement cost than his threat, or search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Troll or Giant enemy and add it to the staging area. Deal each enemy that engages a player through this effect 2 shadow cards.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Across the Ettenmoors

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Attach to an exhausted hero, or to a ready hero if there are no exhausted heroes. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: “Limit 1 per hero. Attached hero cannot ready and does not collect resources during the resource phase. Discard No Rest if the players travel to a safe location.”)

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Across the Ettenmoors

property.name: Type
property.value: Side Quest

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced: At the end of the quest phase, if no progress was placed on Lie Low this round, each enemy gets –20 engagement cost until the end of the round.
Response: After this stage is defeated, choose an enemy in the staging area and shuffle it into the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Across the Ettenmoors

property.name: Type
property.value: Side Quest

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced: After 1 or more resources are spent from a hero’s resource pool, deal 1 damage to that hero.
Response: After this stage is defeated, heal 1 damage from each hero.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Across the Ettenmoors

property.name: Type
property.value: Side Quest

property.name: Text
property.value:
The cost to play each player card is increased by 1.
Forced: When this stage is defeated, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Troll enemy and put it into play engaged with the player with the highest threat. Each player may play a card from his hand, at no cost.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Across the Ettenmoors
